title: “We’re at My Table to Tell a New Story” - With Honey and Dice & Alex Schulte from ACoC Podcast
itunes:title: “We’re at My Table to Tell a New Story” - With Honey and Dice & Alex Schulte from ACoC Podcast
description:
Join us this week for some incredibly insightful discussions with the ray of sunshine that is Honey and Dice & the character creation King Alex Schulte of A Couple of Characters Podcast. We’ll be talking as always about how to make TTRPG’s more inclusive for all, and in the words of Honey, “leaving the table a little better than you found it”.


If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing with your fellow adventurers.

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes.

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com


Honey and Dice:

Twitter - @honeyanddice

Twitch - https://www.twitch.tv/honeyanddice


Alex and A Couple of Characters Podcast:

https://acoupleofcharacterspodcast.com/

Twitter & Instagram - @ACoCPodcast!

Patreon - https://www.patreon.com/acocpodcast


See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
